thread.title: Steven Spielberg Harrison Ford to team up for `Indiana Jones 5`
thread.title_full: Steven Spielberg Harrison Ford to team up for `Indiana Jones 5`

title: Steven Spielberg Harrison Ford to team up for `Indiana Jones 5`
text:
Steven Spielberg, Harrison Ford to team up for `Indiana Jones 5`? 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Wednesday 14th October, 2015 
Ace filmmaker Steven Spielberg has hinted that he might make 'Indiana Jones 5' with Harrison Ford. 
In an interview with Yahoo! Movies, the 68-year-old said he would probably do 'Indiana Jones 5' with Harrison Ford and another film with Tom Hanks, The Independent reports. 
Harrison Ford has already starred in three 'Indian Jones' movies, all of which were directed by Spielberg. 
As of now, Spielberg is promoting his movie, 'Bridge of Spies,' which stars Tom Hanks. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News
